forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 30. Southwest wind around 2 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow showers between 9pm and 3am. Mostly cloudy. Low around 24, with temperatures rising to around 31 overnight. Southwest wind 8 to 15 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

weather_report:
Boston embraces a strikingly clear and crisp day, with the sun casting its warm glow across the cityscape, the vibrant blue sky stretching above like an endless canvas. Though the temperature hovers near a pleasant 30 degrees, the gentle southwest breeze whispers a cool, invigorating promise of the season. As the day unfolds, this lovely ambiance invites you to savor the outdoors, whether it be a leisurely stroll through one of Boston’s many parks or perhaps a quiet moment along the riverbank where you can watch the world pass by. 

As evening approaches, the forecast veers towards a quieter, more contemplative tone, hinting at a chance for snow showers accompanied by a blanket of clouds. The temperature will begin to rise slightly, so bundling up in a comfortable coat and a cozy scarf will serve you well against the evening air. The prospect of snowfall brings a sense of whimsy—considering a warm beverage as you settle in to enjoy the first flakes of the season or perhaps sharing a good book in the glow of soft lighting at home.
